catalogue_raissonne: Murase, Art through a Lifetime, no. 98
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: male figure in monk's dress holding a large crustacean by its front feelers; curved staff behind PR shoulder; figure is standing on a shore; rock formation and gnarled tree behind him
object_name: Hanging scroll, one of a pair
title: The Zen Eccentric Xianzi [left of a pair of Zhutou and Xianzi]
